author: ddas
msg: HADOOP-5233. Addresses the three issues - Race condition in updating status, NPE in TaskTracker task localization when the conf file is missing (HADOOP-5234) and NPE in handling KillTaskAction of a cleanup task (HADOOP-5235). Contributed by Amareshwari Sriramadasu.
